messages.TRMSG_PRE_DOUBLE_BATTLE_1:
Ty: You’re not supposed to intrude
on my time with Sue!
messages.TRMSG_DOUBLE_BATTLE_DEFEAT_1:
Ty: I only have eyes for Sue.
Maybe that’s why we lost?
messages.TRMSG_POST_DOUBLE_BATTLE_1:
Ty: Sue, even in defeat, you’re
so beautiful...!
messages.TRMSG_DOUBLE_BATTLE_NOT_ENOUGH_POKEMON_1:
Ty: I don’t want to do anything
without Sue...Bring two Pokémon at least, OK?
messages.TRMSG_DOUBLE_BATTLE_REMATCH_1:
Ty: Did you come back to intrude
on my time with Sue?
messages.TRMSG_PRE_DOUBLE_BATTLE_2:
Sue: Huh?
You want to battle with me?I will if I can team with Ty!
messages.TRMSG_POST_DOUBLE_BATTLE_2:
Sue: We lost... Ty, I need a hug
to make it all better!
messages.TRMSG_DOUBLE_BATTLE_NOT_ENOUGH_POKEMON_2:
Sue: I only want to battle next to my
sweet Ty.Don’t you have two Pokémon?
messages.TRMSG_DOUBLE_BATTLE_REMATCH_2:
Sue: Oh, it’s you again!
I’ll battle if I can team with Ty!
